about_the_game:
"Fetus" is an electrifying arcade hardcore platformer that transports players back to the fascinating world of ancient Rome. Embark on a high-octane adventure as you face off against relentless legionnaires and menacing mutants, armed with nothing but your trusty axes and spears. With its challenging gameplay, visually captivating pixel art, and an immersive chiptune soundtrack, this game promises an exhilarating experience that will test your skills and determination.

Features
Hardcore Gameplay: "Fetus" offers a challenging and adrenaline-pumping gameplay experience, catering to players seeking a true test of their skills and reflexes.
Ancient Rome Setting: Immerse yourself in the captivating world of ancient Rome, with beautifully crafted pixel art that brings the historical era to life.
Fierce Enemies: Battle against formidable foes, including legionnaires and mutants, each with unique abilities and attack patterns, providing thrilling and dynamic combat encounters.
Weapon Variety: Arm yourself with axes and spears, and strategically choose your weapons to effectively tackle different enemies and obstacles throughout the game.
Engaging Chiptune Soundtrack: Dive into the retro-inspired ambiance with a captivating chiptune soundtrack that complements the pixel art visuals, enhancing the overall gaming experience.

name: FETUS

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 15 MB available space

short_description: "Fetus" is an intense arcade platformer set in ancient Rome. Battle legionnaires and mutants with axes and spears in challenging levels. Featuring hardcore gameplay, pixel art, and chiptune music. Get ready for a thrilling experience!
